artist: Designer: Russel Wright; Manufacturer: Ideal Toy Co., Hollis, New York
creditline: Gift of Jennifer Komar Olivarez and Enrique Olivarez, Jr. in honor of Rachel Olivarez
markings: on bottom of cover, stamped: [Russel Wright / IDEAL (inside an oval) / MADE IN USA]
text: In the late 1950s, Russel Wright contracted with Ideal Toy Co. to produce a child's version of his American Modern line in plastic, so small cooks could have their own Wright set, just like Mother's.  Smaller replicas of the ceramic version, they were identical in shape and color.  Sears was one of the retailers offering the set through its Christmas catalogues.
title: Teapot, from American Modern Play Dishes set
